files.help:
Create a directory for mise-en-place within your `XDG_CONFIG_HOME`:

```mkdir -p '$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/mise'```

Set the `MISE_CONFIG_DIR` environment variable to point to this new directory:

```export MISE_CONFIG_DIR='$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/mise'```

Then move the file to the new location:

```mv ~/.mise.toml _'$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/mise/config.toml```
